alert.note: Alert for Orange; Putnam; Rockland; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 5:14PM EDT until June 26 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Westchester County in southeastern New York... Eastern Orange County in southeastern New York... Western Putnam County in southeastern New York... Rockland County in southeastern New York... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 514 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Monroe to Nanuet, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... New City, Newburgh, Peekskill, Monsey, Nanuet, Haverstraw, Suffern, Mahopac, Monroe, West Point, Sloatsburg, Cold Spring, New Windsor, Gardnertown and Greenwood Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
